text: Henry C. Castellanos (1828–1896) was a New Orleans attorney and judge best known for writing the antebellum compendium New Orleans As It Was, in 1895. It was reissued in 2006, with an introduction by Judith Kelleher Schafer.https://lsupress.org/books/detail/new-orleans-as-it-was/ == References == Category:American judges Category:1828 births Category:1896 deaths
title: Henry C. Castellanos
